result.execSummary:
The defendant Bodine T Aukland was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 5 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bodine T Aukland

BTC: Ct.1 - GUILTY.   Ct.2 - DRI.
$100+DVA+cc, DNA surcharge waived, pp $100/mo beg 8-1-15, ftp 5 days RCJ for contempt.

Defendant Bodine T Aukland in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Deft has finished treatment.
Def is requesting a change of plea date.
BTC: Date set.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Bodine T Aukland in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Def has provided the Court with confirmation of treatment.
Def is requesting an adjournment out to mid May.
State does not object.
BTC: adjournment granted.  Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Bail/bond hearing on March 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Bond was set at the INIT on 2/13/15 as $650C.  To date $150C has been attached to this file.  The Case Manager and the Account Clerk could not locate any other bond posted in this matter.  A Bail Bond Hearing has been set to address this matter.
Status conference on March 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   No violent contact with the victim, EB (person, property, residence or family).  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons.

Defendant Bodine T Aukland in court.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.   Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
Request to lift the no contact order 
BTC: Request to lift the no contact order is granted.  Status conference scheduled for March 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.
